scripts.start: parcel public/index.html public/navbar.html public/searchbar.html public/result.html public/recipe.html public/loginform.html public/registrationform.html
scripts.build: parcel build public/index.html public/navbar.html public/searchbar.html public/result.html public/recipe.html public/loginform.html public/registrationform.html --no-scope-hoist --dist-dir ./dist
